title: Promenade Sea View 03 Bedroom Apartment For Immediate Sale.
details:
Luxury Three Bedroom Apartment For Immediate Sale At The Promenade.

03 Bedroom With 2 Toilets With Attached Bathroom.

Fully Furnished With Large Living & Dinning.

Separate Servants Room & Toilet.

This Is A Direct Sea View Apartment And The Approach From The Galle Road Is Sea Avenue - just before the Pan Asia Bank.

The Road Also Connects To Marine Drive.

There is an IN/OUT to Marine Drive from inside the Promenade compound. There is covered and reserved parking.

The apartment has the normal kitchen fittings and bathroom fittings plus air conditioners in all rooms and light fittings and curtains and a fridge and washing machine.

For Viewing And Other Further Information Of The Apartment, Please Do Not Hesitate In Contacting Us

Web Site: www.menavid.com
